sentences.en: Assists with developing and managing manpower budgets and schemes to ensure optimal utilisation of resources.
sentences.cn: 协助规划和治理人力资源预算,以确保资源的最妥善运用.

sentences.en: But this requires greater domestic competition, reallocation of resources to more productive activity and better utilisation of labour.
sentences.cn: 但这要求加强国内竞争，将资源重新配置到生产率更高的经济活动，并更好地利用劳动力。

sentences.en: In particular , among the packets of the decoration and utilisation.
sentences.cn: 不入格是在烟包装潢傍边使用较众.

sentences.en: The changes in protein requirements as pregnancy proceeds counter - balanced by the increased efficiency of protein utilisation.
sentences.cn: 当妊娠继续进展时,蛋白质需要的变化,可由妊娠蛋白质利用效率增高来加以平衡.

sentences.en: The two sides have also pledged to enhance cooperation in tourism, and the protection and utilisation of cultural heritage.
sentences.cn: 双方承诺在旅游、文化遗产保护和利用等领域加强交流合作。

sentences.en: Volvo Cars has introduced waste management systems to minimise residual products and improve material utilisation.
sentences.cn: Volvo汽车公司采用了废物管理体系,这样可以尽可能地减少副产品并改善原材料的利用.
